bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Barclay retired from Washington and Lee University in 1956 after 40 years of service, mostly in the Alumni Office.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of Barclay's papers describing her wood carvings, including the Washington and Lee Mace, as well as chests for Eleanor Roosevelt and Queen Mother Elizabeth.
